# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its high-quality features and benefits, it's valued at $120 by us. Considering its worth to you, I propose we strike a deal at $95. This is a fantastic opportunity to get a top-tier product at a very reasonable price. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
